text.section: Any person who violates KRS 615.040(4) shall be imprisoned in the county jail not less than ten (10) nor more than sixty (60) days, or fined not less than twenty-five dollars ($25) nor more than two hundred dollars ($200), or both.

Any person who upon thirty (30) days' notice fails to remove a child from the state when required to do so under a bond as provided in KRS 615.040(5)(c) or (d) shall forfeit one thousand dollars ($1,000), to be recovered upon the bond by a suit in the name of the county in which the bond is filed.

law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 61, effective July 1, 1987.
